entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain or light snow late in the evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
